an10.67:1.1: Ekam samayam bhagava kosalesu carikam caramano mahata bhikkhusanghena saddhim yena nalakapanam nama kosalanam nigamo tadavasari.
an10.67:1.2: Tatra sudam bhagava nalakapane viharati palasavane.
an10.67:1.3: Tena kho pana samayena bhagava tadahuposathe bhikkhusanghaparivuto nisinno hoti.
an10.67:1.4: Atha kho bhagava bahudeva rattim bhikkhunam dhammiya kathaya sandassetva samadapetva samuttejetva sampahamsetva tunhibhutam tunhibhutam bhikkhusangham anuviloketva ayasmantam sariputtam amantesi:
an10.67:2.2: Patibhatu tam, sariputta, bhikkhunam dhammi katha.
an10.67:2.5: “Evam, bhante”ti kho ayasma sariputto bhagavato paccassosi.
an10.67:3.1: Atha kho bhagava catuggunam sanghatim pannapetva dakkhinena passena sihaseyyam kappesi pade padam accadhaya sato sampajano utthanasannam manasi karitva.
an10.67:3.2: Tatra kho ayasma sariputto bhikkhu amantesi:
an10.67:3.4: “Avuso”ti kho te bhikkhu ayasmato sariputtassa paccassosum.
an10.67:4.1: “Yassa kassaci, avuso, saddha natthi kusalesu dhammesu, hiri natthi …
an10.67:4.4: panna natthi kusalesu dhammesu, tassa ya ratti va divaso va agacchati, haniyeva patikankha kusalesu dhammesu no vuddhi.
